org.jetel.component.aggregate

Class AggregateProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.aggregate.AggregateProcessor

  • public class AggregateProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Applies aggregate functions on records.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AggregateProcessor(java.lang.String mapping, boolean oldMapping, RecordKey recordKey, boolean sorted, DataRecordMetadata inMetadata, DataRecordMetadata outMetadata, java.lang.String charset)
      Allocates a new AggregateProcessor object.

      Returns the current result of aggregation of sorted data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AggregateProcessor

        public AggregateProcessor(java.lang.String mapping,
                  boolean oldMapping,
                  RecordKey recordKey,
                  boolean sorted,
                  DataRecordMetadata inMetadata,
                  DataRecordMetadata outMetadata,
                  java.lang.String charset)
                   throws AggregationException
        Allocates a new AggregateProcessor object.
        Parameters:
        mapping - aggregate function mapping.
        oldMapping - set to true is the old format of the function mapping is used.
        recordKey - aggregation key.
        sorted - set to true if the input is sorted.
        inMetadata - metadata of the input.
        outMetadata - metadata of the output.
        charset - charset of the output.
        Throws:
        AggregationException

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the processor to initial state.

        Processes a record from the input.
        Parameters:

      • getCurrentSortedAggregationOutput

        public void getCurrentSortedAggregationOutput(DataRecord outRecord)
        Returns the current result of aggregation of sorted data. Should be called only when the aggregation group has changed.
        Parameters:
        outRecord - record for storing the output.

      • getUnsortedAggregationOutput

        public java.util.Iterator<DataRecord> getUnsortedAggregationOutput(DataRecord outRecord)
        Returns the result of aggregation of unsorted data.
        Parameters:
        outRecord - record for storing the output.
        Returns:
        result of aggregation of unsorted data.
